ï»¿ RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE
To: The Presidel it, International Development Association
Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agree went on the proposed Credit (Skills for Jobs and Competitiveness Pre ect) to the Republic of Senegal
The undersigned Cc mmittee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the
Articles of Agreement of tie International Development Association (the Association)
hereby submits its recommtndation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal
that the Association grant t) the Republic of Senegal, a credit in an amount in various
currencies equivalent to SDR 23,700,000. The purpose of said development credit is to
strengthen the Technical a id Vocational Education Training (TVET) system and to
improve the employability of youth in selected priority sectors of the economy.
1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a
credit, and of the purposes t ) which the proceeds of the credit are to be applied.
2. The Committee is cf the opinion that the project toward the financing of which
the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the
Association as set forth in A rticle I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is
designed to promote the eccnomic development of the Republic of Senegal and is of high
developmental priority in th - light of the needs of the Republic of Senegal. Republic of Senegal -2 - Skills for Jobs and Competitiveness Project
3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance
from the Association, and hei eby recommends said project for such assistance.
COMMITTEE
Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel
Nominee selected by Governor for the Republic of Senegal
egional Vice President Africa
Dated at Washington D.C.
2 5 NOV 2014
